meanings.definition: A group of chemical compounds derived from sorbitol.
meanings.sent1: Sorbitans are molecules made from sorbitol.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of sorbitans in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The sorbitans gathered for a conference on chemical compounds.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of sorbitans was as vast as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained the structure of sorbitans in detail.

meanings.definition: A type of emulsifier used in food and cosmetic products.
meanings.sent1: Food manufacturers add sorbitans to keep ingredients mixed together.
meanings.sent2: The beauty industry often includes sorbitans in skincare products.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that sorbitans were the secret to perfect emulsions.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cosmetics, sorbitans were the glue that held everything together.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of sorbitans in emulsifying was evident in the smooth texture of the lotion.
